tools/geomExtract.c

Go to the documentation of this file.

00037 /**
00038  * \file geomExtract.c
00039  * \brief Extract the requested geometry to a new dataset.
00040  *
00041  * $Source: /usr/local/Repositories/fcdmf/fclib/tools/geomExtract.c,v $
00042  * $Revision: 1.5 $ 
00043  * $Date: 2006/09/28 06:34:39 $
00044  *
00045  * \description
00046  *    Usage: geomExtract [options] dataset [meshes]
00047  *
00048  *    Extract the geometry of a single step of a dataset as a
00049  *    stateless Exodus file.
00050  *
00051  * \todo Add handling of dead elements. Clip them out?
00052  *
00053  * \modifications
00054  *   - 09/18/2006 WSD Created.
00055  */
00056 
00057 #include <string.h>
00058 #include "fc.h"
00059 
00060 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
00061   FC_ReturnCode rc;
00062   int i, j;
00063   char* dataset_file_name = NULL;
00064   char* output_file_name = NULL;
00065   char* displ_var_name = NULL;
00066   char** meshNames = NULL;
00067   FC_VerbosityLevel verbose_level = FC_QUIET;
00068   int numMesh = 0, numStep, temp_numStep;
00069   FC_Dataset dataset, new_ds;
00070   FC_Mesh* meshes;
00071   int doDispl = 0;
00072   FC_Variable **displs;  // displs[meshID][stepID]
00073   int stepID = -1;  // the id of the timestep of interest
00074   char* temp_name;
00075 
00076   // --- handle arguments
00077 
00078   if (argc < 2 ) {
00079   usage:
00080     printf("usage: %s [options] dataset [mesh_names]\n", 
00081            argv[0]);
00082     printf("options: \n");
00083     printf("   -h               : print this help message\n");
00084     printf("   -v               : verbose: print warning and error messages\n");
00085     printf("   -V               : very verbose: prints log and error messages\n");
00086     printf("   -o dataset_name  : name of output dataset (default is extracted.g)\n");
00087     printf("   -d var_name      : the displacement variable\n");
00088     printf("   -t time_step     : The index of the timestep at which to find tears\n");
00089     printf("                      (indexing from 0). The default is to use the last one.\n");
00090     printf("\n");
00091     printf("Extracts all meshes (or the specific meshes provided as arguments)\n");
00092     printf("into a stateless Exodus file. If a displacement variable and a time step\n");
00093     printf("are provided, this will extract the displaced geometry at that step.\n");
00094     printf("\n");
00095     fflush(NULL);
00096     exit(-1);
00097   }
00098   for (i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
00099     if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-v")) {
00100       verbose_level = FC_WARNING_MESSAGES;
00101     }
00102     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-V")) {
00103       verbose_level = FC_LOG_MESSAGES;
00104     }
00105     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "-h", 2))
00106       goto usage;
00107     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-o")) {
00108       i++;
00109       output_file_name = argv[i];
00110     }
00111     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-d")) {
00112       doDispl = 1;
00113       i++;
00114       displ_var_name = argv[i];
00115     }
00116     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-t")) {
00117       i++;
00118       stepID = atoi(argv[i]);
00119     }
00120     else {
00121       dataset_file_name = argv[i];
00122       // optional mesh names
00123       for (j =i+1; j < argc; j++) {
00124      void* tmp;
00125      if (argv[j][0] == '-') 
00126        break;
00127      tmp = (char**)realloc(meshNames, (numMesh+1)*sizeof(char*));
00128      if (!tmp)
00129        fc_exitIfError(FC_MEMORY_ERROR);
00130      meshNames = tmp;
00131      meshNames[numMesh] = (char*)malloc((strlen(argv[j])+1)*sizeof(char));
00132      strcpy(meshNames[numMesh], argv[j]);
00133      numMesh++;
00134      i++;
00135       }
00136     }
00137   }
00138 
00139   // testing args
00140   if (!dataset_file_name)
00141     goto usage;
00142   if (output_file_name == NULL)
00143     output_file_name = "extracted.g";
00144 
00145   // --- setup
00146 
00147   // init library and load dataset 
00148   rc = fc_setLibraryVerbosity(verbose_level);
00149   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00150   rc = fc_initLibrary();
00151   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00152   rc = fc_loadDataset(dataset_file_name, &dataset);
00153   fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to load dataset '%s'", dataset_file_name);
00154   
00155 
00156   // Make sure meshes exist (or get all meshes) {
00157   if (numMesh > 0) {
00158     meshes = (FC_Mesh*)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(FC_Mesh));
00159     if (!meshes)
00160       fc_exitIfError(FC_MEMORY_ERROR);
00161     for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00162       FC_Mesh *returnMeshes;
00163       int numReturnMeshes;
00164       rc = fc_getMeshByName(dataset, meshNames[i], &numReturnMeshes,
00165                    &returnMeshes);
00166       fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "failed to get mesh by name");
00167       if (numReturnMeshes != 1){
00168      fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_INPUT_ERROR,
00169                     "Failed to find (unique) mesh '%s' - found %d matches",
00170                     meshNames[i],numReturnMeshes);
00171       }
00172       meshes[i] = returnMeshes[0];
00173       free(returnMeshes);
00174     }
00175   }
00176   else {
00177     rc = fc_getMeshes(dataset, &numMesh, &meshes);
00178     fc_exitIfError(rc);
00179     if (numMesh < 1)
00180       fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_ERROR, "No meshes in dataset");
00181     meshNames = (char**)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(char*));
00182     if (!meshNames)
00183       fc_exitIfError(FC_MEMORY_ERROR);
00184     for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00185       rc = fc_getMeshName(meshes[i], &meshNames[i]);
00186       fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to get mesh name");
00187     }
00188   }
00189 
00190   // Make sure required variable fields exist on the meshes
00191   if (doDispl) {
00192     displs = (FC_Variable**)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(FC_Variable*));
00193     if (!displs)
00194       fc_exitIfError(FC_MEMORY_ERROR);
00195     for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00196       rc = fc_getOrGenerateUniqueSeqVariableByName(meshes[i], displ_var_name,
00197                                  &temp_numStep,
00198                                  &displs[i]);
00199       fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to find displacement variable '%s'",
00200                   displ_var_name);
00201       if (!displs[i]){
00202      fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_INPUT_ERROR,
00203                     "Failed to find (unique) displacement variable '%s'", displ_var_name);
00204       }
00205 
00206 
00207       if (i == 0)
00208      numStep = temp_numStep;
00209       else {
00210      if (temp_numStep != numStep) {
00211        fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_ERROR, "the displacement vars do not have "
00212                       "the same number of steps on each mesh");
00213      }
00214       }
00215     }
00216     // setup the stepID
00217     if (stepID == -1) {
00218       stepID = numStep-1;
00219     }
00220     else {
00221       if (stepID < 0 || stepID > numStep-1)
00222      fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_ERROR, "stepID (%d) is out of range (0-%d)",
00223                     stepID, numStep-1);
00224     }
00225   }
00226 
00227   // --- Set up new dataset
00228   
00229   rc = fc_getDatasetName(dataset, &temp_name);
00230   fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to get dataset name");
00231   rc = fc_createDataset(temp_name, &new_ds);
00232   fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to create new dataset");
00233   free(temp_name);
00234 
00235   // --- Copy mesh geometries
00236   
00237   for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00238     FC_Mesh new_mesh;
00239     FC_ElementType elemType;
00240     int topodim, numDim, numVert, numElem, *conns;
00241     double *coords;
00242 
00243     // Create new mesh
00244     rc = fc_getMeshName(meshes[i], &temp_name);
00245     fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "failed to get mesh name");
00246     rc = fc_createMesh(new_ds, temp_name, &new_mesh);
00247     fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "failed to create new mesh");
00248     free(temp_name);
00249 
00250     // Get mesh info & data (make a copy of coords & hand off)
00251     rc = fc_getMeshInfo(meshes[i], &topodim, &numDim, &numVert, &numElem,
00252                &elemType);
00253     fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "failed to get mesh info");
00254     if (doDispl) {
00255       rc = fc_getDisplacedMeshCoords(meshes[i], displs[i][stepID], &coords);
00256       fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "failed to get displaced mesh coords");
00257     }
00258     else {
00259       double* temp_coords;
00260       rc = fc_getMeshCoordsPtr(meshes[i], &temp_coords);
00261       fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "failed to get mesh coords");
00262       coords = malloc(numDim*numVert*sizeof(double));
00263       memcpy(coords, temp_coords, numDim*numVert*sizeof(double));
00264     }
00265     rc = fc_getMeshElementConnsPtr(meshes[i], &conns);
00266     fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "failed to get mesh conns");
00267 
00268     // Add mesh coords
00269     rc = fc_setMeshCoordsPtr(new_mesh, numDim, numVert, coords);
00270     fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "failed to set mesh coords");
00271 
00272     // Add Mesh conns
00273     rc = fc_setMeshElementConns(new_mesh, elemType, numElem, conns);
00274     fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "failed to set mesh conns");
00275   }
00276 
00277   // --- Write new dataset
00278 
00279   rc = fc_writeDataset(new_ds, output_file_name, FC_FT_EXODUS);
00280   fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "failed to write new dataset %s", 
00281                  output_file_name);
00282 
00283   // --- cleanup
00284 
00285   if (doDispl) {
00286     for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) 
00287       free(displs[i]);
00288     free(displs);
00289   }
00290   for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) 
00291     free(meshNames[i]);
00292   free(meshNames);
00293   free(meshes);
00294   fc_deleteDataset(dataset);
00295   fc_finalLibrary();
00296 
00297   exit(0);
00298 
00299 }
Generated on Mon Oct 27 13:25:50 2008 for FCLib by  1.5.5
